resources.string: 1. Welcome to Quokka! Quokka is a personal feeling diary app. You can record your feelings alongside their triggers, solutions etc. during your day. Besides, Quokka, saving these records for you, it would also try to provide you with solutions based on your needs
2. The home screen shows the history of what you\'ve felt in the last 7 days, you can add feelings by tapping on each card
3. At the first launch, you won\'t see any data, the app would update the home screen automatically, whenever you add a new feeling
4. You can access the statistics screen by tapping the statistics icon to get a general idea of how you\'ve felt in the past
5. Feelings are complicated, sometimes we cannot clearly figure out how we\'re feeling, so here is a cheat sheet for you! tap on any feeling to get a little description about it.
6. Lastly, we value your opinions and ideas very much, if you\'ve got anything that you want to tell us, you can send us a mail by using these links
Definition: A pleasant emotional state that elicits feelings of joy, contentment and satisfaction
Definition: A primal emotion that is important to survival and triggers a fight or flight response
Definition: An emotional state leading to feelings of hostility and frustration
Definition: An emotional state characterized by feelings of disappointment, grief or hopelessness
Definition: Persistent sadness and a lack of interest or pleasure in previously rewarding or enjoyable activities.
Expressions: Increased heart rate, trouble concentrating,Feeling fatigued often, Irritability, Excessive feelings of worry that are difficult to control, Difficulty with sleeping
Expressions: Glare, eyebrows drawn together, tight lips
Expressions: Frown, loss of focus in eyes, tears
Expressions: Feeling suffocated, no eye contact, always feeling tired
